Params: {3: '~May fate unfold in a gentle sway.~'}
{3: '~To spiritual peaks, may you find your way.~'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: "I-It's so cold... I... I don't want to die!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: 'Quick, hurry! Please... let the bleeding stop!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: "That won't do. Get the soldering iron! We gotta seal it off!", 4: '2'}
{3: "~May you, dear one, find well-being's embrace.~"}
{2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: 'The two severely wounded are being attended to.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'We will find her on our way down. No, we have to.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'After giving out the instructions, Pulao leans against a wooden pillar outside the corridor alone and digs out another piece of salted plum candy from her pocket.'}
{3: 'It takes her three tries to get the wrapper off with her fingers still trembling.'}
{3: 'For a brief moment, she is on the verge of tears, but she manages to hold them back.'}
{3: 'She tosses the candy into her mouth and falls into a deep slumber next to heaps of wreckage, surrounded by the cold mist, and amidst the verdant peaks.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Here, hold your hand just a bit higher... right here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'One, two, three... Keep your eyes on your hand, like this... and lift slowly—up to here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "~Yearning for winter's touch. Atop snowy peaks, snow dances...~", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Your eyes and hand have to move together. Except for this last line, when they have to part.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Don't look back, Yoyo. Don't look back.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "The key to this dance is that you can't look back.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Backup Dancer', 3: "Huh? You guys are still here? It's getting late."}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Yoyo's entrance exam is coming up the day after tomorrow, so I'm helping her with her practice.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Backup Dancer', 3: "Oh my, don't be so harsh on your little sister."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yoyo', 3: "I'm not done yet! I want to practice some more.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Backup Dancer', 3: 'But I mean, Hanying, we can let her in without a test if you just put in a word for her.'}
{2: 'Backup Dancer', 3: "Everyone knows how you've been taking care of us all these years."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'No, because I know she can do it if she just puts in the hard work.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Backup Dancer', 3: 'That goes to show that you really are sisters from the same mother.'}
{2: 'Backup Dancer', 3: "Good luck, then. I'll be off. Remember to take a break."}
{2: 'Backup Dancer', 3: 'Uncle Cai saved some food for you two. Remember to go see him before you head back.'}
{3: 'What did the food taste like that evening?'}
{3: "It's the taste of... being a human."}
{2: 'Uncle Cai', 3: 'Oh? Yoyo and Hanying? Quick, sit down.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Sorry for keeping you waiting, Uncle Cai.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Uncle Cai', 3: "Oh, don't worry about it. I need to head out on night patrol anyway—plenty of time to save some food for you."}
{2: 'Uncle Cai', 3: "We've got spicy boiled fish, white-cut chicken, and eggplant with minced pork for dinner tonight."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yoyo', 3: 'Wow! Smells amazing! And there is a whole lot of food!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Uncle Cai', 3: 'I saved a lot for you. A few hungry bears tried to ask for some, but I said no!'}
{2: 'Uncle Cai', 3: "Well, kids need to eat more while they're growing bones."}
{2: 'Uncle Cai', 3: "I'm glad you like it. I'm going to head out for my patrol now. Enjoy your meal."}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "...Slow down or you'll choke. How are you feeling?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yoyo', 3: "I'm fine! Working on the basics should make anyone tired. My muscles are just a little sore, but nothing that can't be solved with a table of yummy food!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "You'll feel better after taking a hot bath when we get home.", 4: '1'}
{3: "I've never... tasted anything like the meal that night ever since."}
{3: "Ever since that night, I've never seen her smile again."}
{3: 'Pulao moves her mouth around only to realize that the salty plum candy has already melted, leaving a sweet flavor with a tinge of sourness and bitterness.'}
{3: 'Coming into sight are the same lush mountains, the same chilly fog, and a path forward that seems to have no end.'}
